verses.name: Ezekiel 29:6
verses.text: And all the inhabitants of Egypt shall know that I am the Lord, because they have been a staff of reed to the house of Israel.

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:7
verses.text: When they took hold of thee by thy hand, thou didst break, and rend all their shoulder: and when they leaned upon thee, thou brakest, and madest all their loins to be at a stand.

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:8
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I will bring a sword upon thee, and cut off man and beast out of thee.
